Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> This mostly would only happen to solo miners, if they didn't set a default address. Most people just have a few addresses, which is fine

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> @JWolf (WW Clan leader) that sounds pretty nice and easy. Safe.trade is also supporting our change

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> we will also have pools that support paying out directly to new Sapling zaddrs, which are fast as heck. A few seconds

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> the whole reason to get rid of Sprout zaddrs is that really bad bugs were found in them: http://myhush.org/sapling/

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> There is no way to know the value inside a zaddr (feature not a bug!) so it's impossible to migrate funds from a zaddr from one chain to another

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> That shows you how strong the privacy of a zaddr is

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I seriously hope something like this never happens again, but we can't predict the future

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <JWolf (WW Clan leader)> do you happen to know if zhash will auto-convert?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> in theory, bad people can print infinite money inside of Sprout zaddrs, which is a really bad bug.

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> @JWolf (WW Clan leader) i have been working closely with zhashpro, i can ask them when i speak to them next

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> each mining pool will have their own way of doing things

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> some use s-nomp, some k-nomp or others

Content: [dscrd-hush] <JWolf (WW Clan leader)> What address am I mining to? or does it matter? everyone in the pool still has t1...

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> @JWolf (WW Clan leader) i suggest finding your new address on https://dexstats.info/addressconverter.php

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> put FROM: HUSH, TO: KMD

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> and then use that address as your mining worker name

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I have no idea if some pools will support converting that address for you, that is up to them

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> this is part of the complexity of changing our source code and address format, but we only pay this tax once

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> and we get some pretty amazing stuff, for this short term pain
